title: nIre nI
sahitya:
nIre nI karatare mArasundharana mArasundharana sukumAra sundharana


caraNam 1    gollara maneyoLagidda pAl mosara mellane melluva vallabha hariya
    caraNam 2    yAdavaranella Adarisidana vEda vEdAntana yAdava priyana
    caraNam 3    vara gauripuradalli vAsavAgihana varada purandara viTTalarAyana
